info.title: ValueSets Enumeration API
info.description: API endpoint providing an enumeration of all available ValueSet schemas

get.summary: Get enumeration of all ValueSet schemas
get.description: Returns a list of all available ValueSet schemas with metadata

EnumerationResponse.title: ValueSet Enumeration Schema

schemas.description: Array of available schemas

url.description: Relative URL to the schema file

valueSetUrl.description: FHIR canonical URL of the ValueSet

codeCount.description: Number of codes in the ValueSet
